City Secretary
==============

Theresa Van Meter,
TRMC
[409.883.3468](tel:4098833468)
The City Secretary serves as the secretary to the Mayor and City Council, preparing all agendas and minutes of said meetings.  She serves as the City Treasurer, Records Management Officer and Elections Clerk.  She oversees the Finance Department and the day-to-day operations of the Municipal Court.
